body:

Ask what you want.

title: {AMA} LythureIsBack

replies.body:

Chocolate or chips?

replies.body:
I´m a support in scrims, this mean that I am able to do anything when it´s needed.

Mmmmm difficult decision, I think I will choose dark chocolate.

replies.body:
Hi

I think that you are a nice person in real life, but here your behaviour is not as well as it should be(no offense). Also I don´t know you so much so I can´t opine deeply.

Lythure was me

I am back after more than a year and a half

I have good feelings with the team, they are very funny and on scrims they are pretty matture and serious.

I think that you are a great person, because you are pretty matture and you know how to manage every single situation. Also you are a great leader and if you get promoted I think you will do it pretty good.

Pancakes

Obviously I love you so much :3
